archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Manage Number Portability Requests
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: The Manage Number Portability Requests process ensures that the portability activities are assigned and managed efficiently and effectively.

properties.value: The Manage Number Portability Requests process ensures that the portability activities are assigned and managed efficiently and effectively. Responsibilities of these processes include, but are not limited to: â€¢Â Â Â Â Â Â Modifying or canceling open number portability requests â€¢Â Â Â Â Â Â Modifying the number portability request status â€¢Â Â Â Â Â Â Scheduling number portability request â€¢Â Â Â Â Â Â Adding additional information to number portability request â€¢Â Â Â Â Â Â Reporting the completion status of number portability request â€¢Â Â Â Â Â Â Managing communication flow with Number Portability Clearinghouse
